definition: the flattened weblike part of a feather consisting of a series of barbs on either side of the shaft, construct or form a web, as if by weaving
details:
noun
- the flattened weblike part of a feather consisting of a series of barbs on either side of the shaft
= synonyms: vane
- membrane connecting the toes of some aquatic birds and mammals
- an intricate trap that entangles or ensnares its victim
= synonyms: entanglement
- a fabric (especially a fabric in the process of being woven)
- computer network consisting of a collection of internet sites that offer text and graphics and sound and animation resources through the hypertext transfer protocol
= synonyms: World Wide Web, WWW
- an interconnected system of things or people
= synonyms: network
- an intricate network suggesting something that was formed by weaving or interweaving
= example: an intricate network suggesting something that was formed by weaving or interweaving
verb
- construct or form a web, as if by weaving
= synonyms: net
